bookTitle: Claudius the God and His Wife Messalina
plot: Robert Graves begins anew the tumultuous life of the Roman who became emperor in spite of himself. Captures the vitality, splendor, and decadence of the Roman world at the point of its decline.
characters: Tiberius Claudius Caesar, Valeria Messalina, Herodes Agrippa, Cassius Chaerea
